type: Notice of Intent to Award a Contract
short_summary: Battery modules and equipment required in pursuant of Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC electrical products in the Atlantic region.
description: The government of Canada is soliciting tenders for the supply of battery modules and equipment, in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the tender notice. The Supply Arrangement E60HN-16ELEC is established to provide electrical products to the Atlantic region.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement for Battery Modules

**Tender Reference Number:** #cb-355-63459509
**Tender Title:** Battery Modules
**Solicitation Number:** 30004895
**Solicitation Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Publication Date:** 2023-10-25
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-09 14:00:00
**Contact Information:**

*   Name: **Carina Della Valle**
*   Email: <Carina.DellaValle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca>
*   Phone: (343) 542-9691

**Project Overview:**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada procures battery modules and equipment through a Supply Arrangement for electrical products in the Atlantic region. The procurement method is competitive and aims to select the lowest price submitted.

**Important Dates:**

*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-13
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31

**Regions of Opportunity:**

The procurement is open to bidders located in *Nova Scotia*, as specifically detailed in the specified regions.

**Regions of Delivery:**

*   *Newfoundland and Labrador*
*   *St. John's*
*   *Canada*

**Applicable Trade Agreements:**

This Request for Supply Arrangement is subject to the provisions of the *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*.

**Appendix:** You can find the complete tender announcement at: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23033/30004895---npp-%28en10.25.2023..pdf (English)  
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23033/30004895-npp-%28fr10.25.2023..pdf (Français)   [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23033/30004895---npp-%28en10.25.2023..pdf)  [Français](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23033/30004895-npp-%28fr10.25.2023..pdf)  

Please do not hesitate to contact us for clarification regarding the requirements and ITB submission procedures. We are looking forward to receiving
